EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Today's voicemail (1562253916.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Today's voicemail (1562253916.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Laura,
I hope all is well with you and that you had a good Canada Day long weekend. I am in the process of getting everything together and I am wondering if you have had a chance to review the report I sent you and confirm for me what would be your core supplies you use. As discussed I would focus on the largest quantities and go from there. Please let me know so I can ensure to include everything. Thanks again and have a great day.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom| Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents
